name: Breakfast Town
description:
Enjoy 3 stages progressing in difficulty.  Quite challenging. Be prepared to Rage!

This game was made by : Ramon Jasper S. Boquiren, Albert Roy Trias, Miguel Domingo, Eliza Pascua and Nathaniel Ruiz.

This was our game programming 2 Finals.

Music was created by Miguel Domingo

Art Assets  created by Eliza Pascua and Nathaniel Ruiz
